name: Nenji
description:
A simple 2d platformer made with Godot engine and some love ;3

Note: This game is in the very early ( and I do mean VERY EARLY) stage of its development, It's no way near to being finished.

Story:
It's 2150, for some reason ninjas are still a thing. The main character Nenji (I know it's a very creative name if i say so myself XD) is a young ninja-wannabe  who is training to be a full-fledged ninja in various simulations designed to teach him skill for being an actual ninja. While training he is often interrupted by his neighbor's daughter Jiji, who unlike Nenji, is already a full-fledged ninja. She's had a crush on him for as long as she can remember, so she always keeps secretly following  him while he's training and when she gets a chance she attacks him, in order to kiss him uwu. On the other hand Nenji only cares about becoming a ninja and he's finds Jiji very annoying due her constant interruptions during his training and her persistant demands for kisses.
